name: Awaken
description:
In our patience, we all look forward to an even better future to come. But what if patience is our only excuse? The excuse we keep telling ourselves just because we're afraid of the risk of change? If long and hopeless patience is the proof that what we have tried all along is not the right path for us?

Is it time for us to wake up from that maze-like dream? The bright future that never comes because we keep on escaping reality with meaningless patience. Should we awaken to meet the world and find the true light for our own lives?

------------
This piece has a sound that I did by the application on my IPad.
------------
